posts.title: Ubuntu 刷新 DNS 缓存
posts.path: Note/Solved/Ubuntu 刷新 DNS 缓存/
posts.text: 使用 systemd 1# 清除缓存2sudo systemd-resolve --flush-caches34# 查看 DNS 缓存大小5sudo systemd-resolve --statistics 使用 dns-clean 1sudo /etc/init.d/dns-clean start

posts.title: Everything 索引不全
posts.text: 找到菜单 工具 > 选项 > 索引 ， 点击 强制重建 即可。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"2$ hexo g 3$ hexo s More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
